name: Fashion Shop Tycoon
description:
Go from owning a small store to running a luxury boutique where even celebrities get their clothes!

Beat levels by managing staff, handling customers' requests and fulfilling their every wish.

Upgrade your shop! Order equipment and update your clothes collections to keep your customers happy. The cooler your products, the more money you make!

Time management isn't so easy! Use powerful boosters to get out of tricky spots quickly and easily.

A small outlet selling jeans and tank tops? Or a boutique selling off-the-rack clothes? How this story ends is up to you!
